meanings.definition: The number of people available or required to perform a task or job.
meanings.sent1: The manpowers needed to complete the project were insufficient.
meanings.sent2: The company hired additional manpowers to meet the deadline.
meanings.sent3: Despite their best efforts, the manpowers couldn't finish on time.
meanings.sent4: The manpowers rallied together to tackle the challenging task.
meanings.sent5: The manpowers in the team showed great dedication and teamwork.

meanings.definition: The collective skills and abilities of a group of people.
meanings.sent1: The diverse manpowers of the team ensured success in various projects.
meanings.sent2: Effective communication is crucial for utilizing the manpowers efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The manpowers of the group made even the toughest tasks seem easy.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership brought out the best in the manpowers under her.
meanings.sent5: The manpowers combined their strengths to overcome any obstacles.
